content.description: Stand start with match on head height flake. Move out and up to a good hold followed by a big move into the split. Continue up the face on good holds with some tricky movement to comfortably topout. Plenty of opportunities to safely bail into pads before pulling the top.
content.protection: A few pads in the pit with a spotter at the rear. More pads wouldn't hurt. There are big holds / easy to reverse moves on the face that you can safely bail from into the pit. However, an uncontrolled fall near the top would be very hard to safely protect. If you don't know, don't go for it.

content.description: Large boulder on hill above water tank with small overhanging / roof feature. Full shade past noon.
